name: Spaceman Jasper
dialogue:
: 
 Do you have any lightning glass? 
 I have rice to trade.

: 
 There's nothing like a 
 spacewalk in the morning.

name: Spaceman Sam
dialogue:
: 
 Do you have any interesting fossils? 
 I make the best spaghetti sauce, 
 but I don’t give it to strangers 
 for free.

: 
 If anyone asks, I'm not out here.

name: Spaceman Nyckolle
dialogue:
: 
 Salsa is my jam! I’ll trade you some 
 for something sparkly from the 
 snow planet!

: 
 Have you looked at all the plants?

name: Spaceman Kun
dialogue:
: 
 Have you been to the Volcano planet? 
 I hear they have beautiful 
 rocks there.

: 
 Did you end up cooking 
 something nice?
